edu.cuny.cat.trader
Class TradingAgent

java.lang.Object
  java.util.Observable
      edu.cuny.cat.trader.AbstractTradingAgent
          edu.cuny.cat.trader.TradingAgent
All Implemented Interfaces:
AuctionEventListener, Parameterizable, Prototypeable, Resetable, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.Observer
public class TradingAgent
extends AbstractTradingAgent
implements java.io.Serializable

An implementation of trading agents that can bid in a market up to a fixed number of units of commodities, and can choose between markets to maximize their profit.

Version:
$Revision: 1.29 $
Author:
Kai Cai
